import React from 'react' import styles from '../../../styles/styles'; import CountDown from "./CountDown" import { backend_url } from '../../../server'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const EventCard = ({active, data}) => { return (

{data.name}

{data.description}

{data.originalPrice}$
{data.discountPrice}$

See Details
{/*
addToCartHandler(data)}>Add to cart
*/}
) } export default EventCard
